alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL ITASCA AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Chisholm, to near Hibbing, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hibbing around 950 PM CDT. Chisholm around 955 PM CDT. Cherry around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mountain Iron, Buhl, Virginia, Eveleth and Gilbert. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
